definition: classifier for trees, cabbages, plants etc
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
don't insist on only taking one road to Rome (idiom)/there's more than one way to skin a cat
pinyin: bu4 yao4 zai4 yi1 ke1 shu4 shang4 diao4 si3

sentences.english: Tie the horse to the tree.
No, for God told us notto eat from that tree.
sentences.chinese: 上帝警告过我们不要去吃那棵树上的果实的。

sentences.english: Your 96-year-old gran or that craggy tree at the bottom of the garden?
sentences.chinese: 你96岁的奶奶还是花园里的那棵老树？

sentences.english: There is a recursive formula for the number of spanning trees in a graph.
sentences.chinese: 对于一个图的生成树的棵数，存在一个递推公式。

sentences.english: She tied a yellow ribbon round the oak tree.
sentences.chinese: 她把一条黄丝带缠绕在那棵橡树上。

sentences.english: Many thousands of trees are planted in spring every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年春天都种下成千上万棵树。

sentences.english: Well, aren't you glad now that you get rid of that old tree?
sentences.chinese: 好啦，难道你现在不因为去掉了那棵古树而欣喜吗？

sentences.english: Sengoku warrior on horseback has been created from hundreds of thousands of rice plants.
sentences.chinese: 马背上的战国武士用水稻几十万棵。

sentences.english: She heard the barking of an old dog that was chained to the sycamore tree.
sentences.chinese: 一条老狗的吠声传来，狗拴在那棵悬铃木上。

sentences.english: "Over there", his figure pointed to a grave mound that was under the pine-tree which I had kissed last year.
sentences.chinese: 他指了指我去年亲吻过的那棵松树下的坟包说。

sentences.english: Already 4 million trees have been felled or marked for destruction.
sentences.chinese: 已经有4百万棵树被砍伐或是标记要毁掉的。

sentences.english: They had sawn up the fallen tree, so they had a good store of firewood.
sentences.chinese: 他们把那棵倒下的树锯断了，因此贮存了丰富的柴火。

sentences.english: The spurting blood turned the white mulberry tree into a dark purple.
sentences.chinese: 那飞溅的鲜血把那棵白桑树也染成了深紫色。

sentences.english: Of the tree which grew by the tomb, near the head of Kalos, they also spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他们还谈到了喀洛斯枕边的那棵坟头树。

sentences.english: This tree is twice as short as that one.
sentences.chinese: 这棵树比那棵树矮一倍。

sentences.english: Up till now we have planed over 24000 fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止我们共种了二万四千多棵果树。

definition: tree trunk/stump (tree root)/a plant/classifier for trees or plants/strain (biology)/to involve others (in shady business)
Tashu township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
Lishu county in Siping 四平, Jilin/Lishu district of Jixi city 雞西|鸡西[Ji1 xi1], Heilongjiang
